While backend is my primary focus, Iâ€™ve gained valuable fullstack experience through side projects with <highlight>Go</highlight>, <highlight>React</highlight>, <highlight>Next.js</highlight>, and <highlight>TypeScript</highlight>.

cta.text: Eager to bring my skills and dedication to your company's next big project.

about.title: About Me
about.personalInfoQuote: Delivering Innovative Solutions for Over 4 Years
about.personalInfoDescription: I specialize in creating intuitive websites that offer dynamic and engaging user experiences, bringing ideas to life through innovative solutions.
about.name: Jakkarin Mitvongsa
about.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

details.0: I worked on 2 projects. I was a core member in development team.
details.1: First project was building web application for e-commerce with chatbot utilizing HTML/IBM Watson Assistant/CSS/React.js/Node.js/MongoDB.
details.2: Second project worked on IoT mobile app using Arduino/C/React Native/IBM Watson IoT/Node.js/MongoDB.

details.0: Developed and maintained backend services using Node.js, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and AWS Lambda, enhancing system reliability and scalability.
details.1: Built an ETL pipeline to migrate data from MongoDB to Amazon Redshift using Python and AWS S3, improving data analytics by ensuring up-to-date and accurate data warehousing.
details.2: Engineered a notification and broadcast system for the LINE messaging app using Node.js, PostgreSQL, AWS Lambda, and cron jobs, improving user communication through scheduled notifications and targeted broadcasts.
details.3: Optimized analytics and reporting by introducing Apache Airflow for data rollups and migrating from Amazon Redshift to PostgreSQL, reducing query times and operational costs while improving performance.
details.4: Enhanced system security by mitigating SQL injection vulnerabilities using Prepared Statements and implementing security headers with Helmet in Node.js, strengthening overall application security.
details.5: Ventured into game development using Unity and C#, creating a mini-game in 15 days and developing cutscene scenarios, quest systems, and inventory systems in one month, demonstrating adaptability and quick learning.
details.6: Conducted load testing and performance optimization, resulting in a 132% increase in completed requests per minute and achieving 100% API success rates, ensuring high availability and reliability of services.

work.description: These projects highlight my proficiency by demonstrating my skills in action.
